content.detailedDescription:
I take picture of my cellphone at the same time of 16:07 
but one picture existing the other is not.

yesterday i watching picture  
i find out beyond of see ufo
content.summary: I take picture same time of 16:07 but one picture existing the other is not

content.detailedDescription: Witness was lying in bed and noticed slow moving light from window, went to look and as the light came closer to trees on the property, the witness saw that appeared to a straight line of lights, multicolored, and low in the sky. after 3-4 seconds, the lights shot off to the east very quickly. there was no sounds heard during the sighting. witness called her friend because she thought the craft was hovering over the friend's neighborhood. the friend said that she was in bed at the time, however, one of her normally docile cats woke her up in a frenzy, and that cat appeared to want the woman to get out of bed. the witness indicates that the owner of the cat will likely consent to interview if deemed necessary. the witness also says that she is an artist and will be glad to provide a sketch of what she saw. she has declined anonymity.
content.summary: Line of colored lights coming from west near oak ridge then shot off to the east

content.detailedDescription: My wife daughter and grandson were flying a kite when the wife noticed the object in the completely clear blue sky sitting stationary at what they said seemed to be a very high altitude. when the wife saw it at first it was horizontal.When she looked back at it after pointing it out to my daughter it was vertical. my daughter handily had a camera in hand and snapped one photo befor it dissapeared. they did not see it vannish. they just were unable to locate it again and assumed it was gone. keep in mind it was windy enough to keep the kite aloft down here at ground level. typicaly winds at the altitude where this object was seen are a lot stronger yet it was stationary for several mins.
content.summary: Stationary elongated narrow middle. it repositioned itself  from horizontal to vertical but remained stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
On november 29, 2009 my husband, my son and i were out in anza borrego desert exploring. we were in grapevine canyon; we stopped at 1:30 pm to eat lunch. we were close to the end of the canyon in an old indian village looking around. at approximately 1:54 pm we heard a military jet go by.  we looked up and saw to the left of us a silver object. it moved across the sky from left to right slowly, then it broke apart into what looked like a larger triangle of three silver balls. it then moved slowly and went back to the smaller object which was a smaller triangle. my husband yelled "ufo" and i started taking pictures. what is weird with the three pictures i am sending to you is that in the third picture it does not take off and disappear...It disappears in place. the wires you see in the photos are telephone wires. 

grapevine canyon is a sandy trail located between the volcan mountains and grapevine hills into anza-borrego desert state park. grapevine canyon can be reached via a road that passes through private property off s22. another access is from s22 through the jasper trail which is more towards the west end of the grapevine canyon.
content.summary: Ufo grapevine canyon

content.detailedDescription:
One night last july (date/time is wrong on my camera) i noticed a bright light in the eastern sky (probably 30 degrees or so off the eastern horizon). when i had a closer look, there were several points of light forming an arrowhead formation about 30-35 degrees off the eastern horizon  (first picture). i've highlighted the slightly dimmer points of light to emphasize the formation. it was much more noticeable that night. i live right at bay and bloor, and normally see very few stars due to the city lights.
when i looked at the formation through binoculars, i could only see blobs of light. after debating whether it was worth it, i finally decided to pull out my tripod and dslr to grab a few shots. when i downloaded the images, the thumbnails didn't look promising so i forgot about them until just recently. i have seven or so photos, most at fast shutter speeds, so they're quite grainy. i was focusing on the brightest point of light in the formation of lights, but it turns out the other point of light (to the bottom right corner of the closeup images) is more interesting. the last two pictures are of the same two points of light. upon inspection, it would appear that at least one of the light sources appears to be tumbling.The cloesups  were shot through a 200 mm lens with 3 and 4 second exposures at f10 and f11. the pictures were all taken with a few minutes of each other. 
what is it ?
bruce in toronto
content.summary: Noticed (through my window) a formation of lights in the eastern sky and decided  to  pull out my tripod and dslr . . .

content.detailedDescription: At 7:35pm, approached from the east, low to the roof tops and really glowed with intermittent lights. was thrown off a bit at first, by low engine noise, not that of plane or helicopter but certainly of some type of engine. very confident this is a ufo.
content.summary: Hard to miss this most amazing, bright saucer/disc which upon closer examination was a more like a shape altering - sphere/cube .

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 21:03 hrs. local, i was trying to pull into my driveway, but was blocked by an indiana state trooper helping a motorist. when said trooper got out of his car and walked up to me, i explained i lived in the house he was blocking. he politely moved his car and as i was pulling in, notice through a large break in the clouds, a saturn or star like object in a stationary position. the object was a bluish and white color, very luminescent with a small tail of the same color. it then did a quick backup and shot forward, gaining momentum and wobbling. it also did a small zig zag, then came to another stop. this would not be inherent of a satellite as then it faded. i thought perhaps the clouds may have obscured the object, however, there were visible stars and planets near it. i then exited the vehicle to go into the house and felt it inappropriate to speak with the trooper because he was busy. there was also another trooper present, but i also felt it inappropriate to bother him, too.

my background is in earth and space science, hence, i am familiar with astronomical objects. this did not behave as a satellite, star, planet or iss. since living in indiana, i have seen some pretty interesting stuff, but it was a little more exciting living on long island, where i had seen quite a bit of interesting things since the 1950's. my only reaction was that i thought it was pretty cool. my feelings after the sighting? only that it is inconceivable that we humans are alone in the universe, so i just smiled to myself.
content.summary: Bluish light w/tail moving from stop position

content.detailedDescription: I was on the way home from church and was heading west out of fort smith on hwy 64 and turned north on hwy 64d and noticed looking east directly over fort smith a bright triangle pattern. i am an amatuer astronomer and one of the founders of the ark/okla astronomical society which we formed in 1985. we are a very active group with public viewing events and have worked with the local media on special events or call ins about unusual sightings. i am very experienced in observing the night sky so when i saw this object i immediatly stopped the car and started doing estimates. it was about 7:40 p.M. and the lights making up the triangle shape were bright red with an apparent magnitude between jupiter and venus in intensity. the triangle shape was side ways pointing south with one light in the middle. it was about 5 degrees above the horizon and clearly visible thru the sky glow of fort smith. at about 7:50 p.M. the individual lights started to look like they were vibrating then started flashing from red to white for about a minute. the object had not moved any in all this time so i called a co- worker who lives about 22 miles to the south southwest of fort smith in cameron, ok. he immediatly saw the object due east of his house as soon as he walked out. he also was amazed how intense the red lights were and described the pattern exactly the same as i saw it. this confirmed my belief the object was far east of fort smith at an high altitude for us to both see the exact pattern shape. at this time i decided to head directly towards the object and see if i can log some miles and see if the angle changes. at about 8:00 p.M. the object blinked out for about 30 seconds and came back on but this time it made an elongated triangle pointing downward without the middle light. the whole time i had my co-worker on the phone and we were seeing these events at the same time and with the same description. at about 8:10 p.M. the objects blinked out and reappeared as a t shape with 3 exactly distanced in a row with one directly below the center. at about 8:18 p.M. the objects blinked out and reappeared except the bottom light was exactly between and below object one and two. this object would slowly drift towards underneath object one and when aligned would stop then reverse coarse until it was under object number two and then reverse back again. then at about 8:35 p.M. the objects blinked out and we didn't see them again. i had traveled 14 miles thru heavy traffic and the last sight of the object was at the intersection of hwy 22 and 96. the objects at that location still were no higher than 22 degrees above the horizon and i had covered 14 miles.  by my best calculations would have put the objects probably over mount magazine at around 26,000 feet. mt. magazine is the highest elevation between the appalachians and the rockies and would be an ideal land mark from the air. several days later i had talked to several others who saw these objects and were afraid to say anything at the time in fear of ridicule. i had contacted the local media which never responded to my question of these objects being reported and i know at this time of night hundreds had to have seen it.
content.summary: Started out as side ways triangle shape with light in middle, changed too

content.detailedDescription: Every evening i walk my dog prior to going to bed.  last night it was cloudy but there were open spaces between the cloud formations.  i observed over two dozen lights that were spaced out in a line with more lights slowly moving behind them.  they were travelling from the southeast to west and some were slowly zigzagging along.  i was amazed at the number of them so i raced back up the street to my house, put the dog inside and called my wife to come outside to observe them.  she came out and saw the last few move over our heads and they proceeded to go in a westerly direction.  as they were quite high in the sky we could not make out any definitive shape or sizes but they were definitely some type of craft that was being intelligently controlled.  my feelings as i watched them was of some excitement and wonder as i have never observed this type of activity before.
content.summary: Witnessed over two dozen lights in the sky moving in a slow deliberate fashion from southeast to west.

content.detailedDescription: While traveling to korea i took a picture of a cloud that to me looks like abraham lincoln. the picture clearly shows why i took the picture but what i found many years later was some what confusing. now i do know what the two beings in the photo as well as the aircraft is. in the army i was a top gun m1a1 abrams gunner, and until the photo thought i was trained on all vehicles of this world whether foreign or domestic. i did not see this vehicle in broad daylight with the naked eye and it was hoovering right next to my plane as we flew over the ocean. the object in question is clearly shown on the picture. i have been trying to get mufon to analyze the pic but have been told that unless i have the negatives that my case is of no importance. if mufon is on a quest to find out the truth not only do i have more evidence but i have also been visited by the visitors and now dream dreams of end of the world destruction and things to come. i have had white liquid leaking form my eye sockets from being visited and objects around me being picked up by the visitor who presented themselves to me invisible. my son has also been contacted by the visitors. he since seeing them has been confused ever since.  i am not trying to make a name for myself but am interested in what mufon opinion is of this photo. the object is blue/ black/ and white. the beings on the picture have double eyelids bird like features and the look somewhat like humans. in my dreams they look the same. all i would like is someone from mufon to look at the pic. i will even bring the pic to mufon. this is not a hoax. i am also positive that i can help with your research of demensional travel as well. i have given a picture to the u.S. airforce and was told if i value my life, that i will not show the picture. the airforce did tell me that it is one of the militaries auroa projects and they do not know how i got it. interesting huh! the bolts from my government vehicle when i was in the army was also stripped from my vehicle and in an attempt to take my life. so why am i trying to be silence for coming forward with this truth. i am now a disabled vet and have nothing else to lose. the people have to know the truth and i have some evidence to help my claim. this is not a hoax!
content.summary: Daytime ufo/ aliens picture

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the street when a something shiny caugt my eye so i looked up and saw a disc in the sky it was just above the clouds at first i thought it was a weather baloon, but it was going much too fast {about 600 miles per hour} it was going in a straight line i was excited and afraid at the same time also a little confused but i was very happy despite being confused and afraid after a few seconds it dissapeared behind a cloud.
content.summary: Shiny silver disc shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: Friend and i looked up saw a light, thought it waws a plane first but then realized the irregular flashing and colors. first 2 or 3 white flashes, the n blue, the would turn and pulsate all red. crossedd the whole sky in minutes, also seemed to be in orbit but very bright for the distance, it flew off into space. not the horizon very high up very amazing, heard a story from a friends coworkers of a similar sighting exactly one week later. in the same area. did not have a good enough camera to capture it but was also witnessed by a friend who was with me.
content.summary: A friend and i spotted a craft that had irregular flash patterns and colors (white blue, and all red) very high up.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear mrs,

i am sorry to write here this but i did not find any e-mail in your site. i am a portuguese reporter and i am doing a work about the subject you study. would you give me another mail contact? 

i would like to do an interview via skype with some head office.

kind regards,

diogo carreira
reporter
964454475
pdcarreira@gmail.Com
content.summary: Portuguese reporter

content.detailedDescription: While walking my dog--(about 8:35---8:50 pm monday feb 21 2010)--in a south to north direction--i looked up at the clearing but still cloudy sky and saw what appeared to be a very large and bright star become visible through the broken cloud cover behind me and moving fast in a south to north direction--it passed over me(slightly to my right--east)and entered clear skies over my head and in front of me--i got a real good look at it and have no idea what it was--it remained in my sight for a few seconds--(3-4) and then became obscured by clouds to the north and it was gone---let me say that i am not the type of person who would waste my time or yours with a ufo report if i didnt think i saw something really strange--i cant put this out of my mind--it was that weird--so here i am telling you--there was very little  ground light--i had a good view of the sky--i am used to seeing aircraft headed for palm beach international flying at about 35000 feet--this was higher--bigger--much faster--no strobe lights(i would have easily been able to see them if it was a plane)--it was going way to slow for a meteorite and not leaving a streak as they usually do--but going way way to fast for any aircraft and not loosing any altitude like a falling meteor--although i couldnt see it cross the entire sky-- from what i did see i would estimate that it would cross the sky horizon to horizon in about 11 or 12 seconds--also this neighborhood being as quiet as it is--i would have been able to hear a jet--this was silent--i once saw the international space station cross the sky on a really clear night in new york--it appeared to look much like this thing but not quite as fast and maybe not quite as bright--as best as i can determine-the space station was not visible from here at that time--thought i had the answer but apparently not--did anyone else see what i saw?--i hope somebody has the answer--thank you for your time and if anyone can id this thing please let me know..
content.summary: Observed unusual light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I relaize i am reporting an event that occured about 25 years ago but i am now comfortable reporting it to competent persons working in this investigative field. i have difficulty believing that i actually witnessed this event and i have not heard of any other reports describing exactly what i had seen.

i recall this occurred in early spring during mid-evening hours as the sun was almost fully set. i was living in my mother's home at that time. i was sitting outside in the open carport. i first noticed a bright light shining through the tree in the front yard. i assumed it was probably some conventional aircraft with a spotlight. as the light emerged from behind the tree i saw an aircraft the likes i never had seen before. the main body of the craft was shaped like a five-pointed star. the light i first saw seemed to eminate from the star casting a very bright white or pale yellow light. on the lower right point was a sphere. initially the sphere swirled with a rainbow of colors. the craft seemed to drift slowly and was probably not more than about 1000 feet above the rooftops. as the craft reached a position directly across from me over the rooftop of the house across the street it stopped abruptly. the sphere then began to glow a deep red color. the craft then took off at an incredible speed at about a 45 degree angle still travelling on its northerly direction. the craft eventually reached an altitude at which it was no longer visible. through the entire event there was no sound coming from the craft.

as i said before, i have difficulty believing i saw this. i would doubt there are any witnesses as i was home alone and i did not notice any of the neighbors outdoors. during the sighting i was in awe of the craft and i couldn't take my eyes away. i have never heard any other reports describing exactly what i describe and it makes me wonder what this really was.
content.summary: Craft gliding slowly until coming to complete stop, then ascended very swiftly

content.detailedDescription:
My buddy and i were on the sidelines photographing a rugby match south of sydney. he called my attention to the object. it was about the brightness and colour of saturn or jupiter and 2-3x that apparent diameter. flight was from sw to ne on a straight course. he, a sceptic, pointed out that there were no navigation lights. it moved at the speed, i suppose, of a high flying aircraft. therefore 
it was not all that startling. if it had made a sudden right angle turn and sped off at blinding speed i would be much more excited about the sighting. there were a couple of times during this flight when it appeared to waver like a balloon buffeted by a cross wind. however i am not sure i really saw that. (there were stadium lights on so viewing was not optimal). it did seem that it could have been some sort of a hoax. but, it appeared to be glowing with its own (rather than reflected) light. i could be wrong about this though - it wasn't long after sunset and something high enough and big enough could have produced a spectacular reflective effect. i could not estimate its altitude in those conditions however i did watch it on a transit of something like 120 degrees. it simply faded slowly from view out over the ocean in the oceanic haze. my buddy has great professional canon gear and he shot a frame with the 400mm lens. it does not reveal anything though as it appears simply as a bright dot on a black field. not sure of the transit time - it could have been one minute or two. i am aware of something called an iridium flare but am not sure what that is. could this be what we saw? or the iss?
content.summary: Bright star like object in straight flight over rugby match

content.detailedDescription: On monday january 15, 2010 at 5:15 am i was compelled to get up for the day. i usually get up for work at 6:00 and enjoy every bit of sleep i can get. as i walked past my window in my bathroom i notice a bight glow coming from the farm field across from my house. i though the woods were on fire. i quickly through some closes on grabbed my binoculars and ran outside to my driveway. it was raining so i quickly came to grips with the fact of fire in the woods was highly unlikely. i focused the binoculars on the tree line in the distance to see 2 very bright greenish lights. there are no houses or roads in this direction to be confused with. i really wanted to walk out into my yard and move closer but i got a sense of dread to move any further. i watched these lights for about 5 minutes. the lights seemed to be attached to something but i could not make it out. i went back in the house, showered got dressed and started my car in the garage. i opened the garage door and peeked out to see if they still were there, which they were. got in the car and pulled my car on to the driveway. once on the driveway i looked for the lights and they were gone.
content.summary: 2 very bright greenish lights

content.detailedDescription: saturday night 20 feb i went onto my front porch for a smoke and noticed a cluster of lights just west in the sky over hobby lobby. i thought it was an awful lot of helicopters in one group. then i noticed the lights weren't on machines and the color was gold. at the same time i turned my head a little north and saw a kind of lanternshape pale reddish in color on the inside and goldish skin like a balloon.I thought: how do they keep candles burning inside a balloon? the effect was exactly like candlelight. it was beautiful. and i realized that something was happening and there were so many of them and i thought: jeff has to see this. so i opened the door and yelled "come out now!" he was laying on the living room floor. i closed the door and kept watching. jeff came out and i said look and he screamed. then we started to laugh and he said"are we being invaded?" we watched and laughed. there were just so many it was absurd. some of them bounced and we saw two come together and separate in opposite directions. jeff went in and grabbed the binoculars we keep by the door. when the reddish glowing one moved further on it looked like the others which were glowing gold in other words as they got further away and the details weren't clear they just looked like spheres of light.Then jeff was on the walk which goes from our front porch and here comes another from the north and it was still the reddish with the gold envelope around it and he checked it out with the binoculars. he said there was atriangle inside with yellow red and green like a rainbow grading into each color outlined in a bright blue light. he freaked out then and started running down the driveway where he slipped and fell but then he was back up and running down the street. meanwhile the lights were heading sw and as they got further away they appeared like gold from a sparkler but without the flashing got smaller and smaller and the i couldn't see them anymore. one went straight up into the clouds and went transparent when it touched the cloud. we weren't afraid. jeff is my husband.We don't drink or take drugs we  were watching tv before i went outside
content.summary: At least 2 dozen glowing objects came across the sky west of my house traveling without sound from the north to the sw

content.detailedDescription: Its 1am in the moring and im driving down the street. i start noticing 3 unidify flying oribe or ball, they dont look like their moving. i stop at the red light of the street what made me notic the flying object was its color, the ball didnt light up but the glow of its color. orange red looking oribe or ball, i start rolling the windo and stick my head out, and it looks low because everything in the sky was cloudy. also i started to keep going but i could'nt keep my eyes off the site, as i drive slowly i notice that im right under the 3 flyihg objects. when i notice that im actully driving under it i got scared and grave my phone and call 911!!!!!! i dont know why but i think i realy got scared because i wanted someone else to see the site. and plus it was right over our city hall building. hoping that someone would see it , as im telling the operider that im seeing strange lights over or city hall, she thinks that im drunk. she takes down my information and we hang up., so much for try to make someone else to see. i keep driving along the same street maybe half a mile or less i loss site of it, they do not fly away but i just keep't going my way.
content.summary: Red with orang and under it was light.Like a head light of car

content.detailedDescription: On february 16, 2010 at or about 3:08 pm. i was driving south on n. meridian rd, north of grand rives ave, near okemos, mi. weather was very cloudy, solid, dark storm type clouds, they did not appear to be moving. i was not looking at the sky but noticed large movement through the tops of approaching trees. i realized immediately what i was seeing was not normal and slowed the car to a crawl all most stop, as i am not one to look away from the road in front of me while driving. i saw a large oblong shape (cigar shape) at least the length of a football field or even longer. the height i can only guess was maybe 80 to 100 foot tall. it was maybe 1000 foot off the ground. i really do not know but did measure with my hand. it was darker then the clouds behind it. it was a matted flat charcoal black with very defined edges, it seemed like it was outlined in a darker black at the edges. if it were not for the darker edges, it almost would have been camouflaged to the clouds behind it, but the edges made the shape very defined and stand right out. the shape was moving southeast steady but much slower then an airplane. my brain tried to say that it was a huge black airplane, however there were no wings. if it were a plane i could see it clear enough i should have seen huge wings, but it was way way to big to be a plane, and moving to slow to be a plane. i watched it for about 10 seconds then it disappeared. about 6 seconds after that it reappeared for about 15 seconds again, still moving in the same direction. no lights, it just disappeared again. i thought maybe i should stop and just watch for a few minutes then decided to go slow and keep glancing for it in the direction it was headed, and i could get passed the trees and maybe see it totally unobstructed from trees. although in no way did the trees prevent or alter what i was seeing, i just wanted complete view without any trees. i continued south on meridian rd seeing nothing. i crossed grand rive ave, continued on meridian rd, when i came to the i-96 overpass on meridian rd, (about 5 minutes after seeing the object) i decided to stop the car on top of the overpass and just look as long as no cars were on the road. i figured i would just look in the direction the craft was heading when i saw it, taking advantage of the height of the overpass and wide-open space and maybe see it again. i was not stopped but maybe 30 seconds and a lighting like almost blinding pulse type intensity flash of blue white clear light in the sky at about the same height as the object was flying. the flash was not lighting. it held a large oblong shape for the entire time it was visible, about 6 seconds. i would say the shape was the size of a large two-story house. it was directly over the highway towards williamston. it seemed to have depth somehow in the center. i have to feel this was related, as that area would have been about where the object would have been if it continued on the same path of flight and speed, it was traveling just minutes earlier. i cannot think of anything else in the area that it could have been.  it was not a normal thing to see, and it was above the highway, which goes on for miles in the same direction at the same elevation, it would not have been a reflection from traffic in the distance, it was too high. it reminded me of a huge doorway but it was like lightning. there were cars approaching so i moved on.
content.summary: Okemos, mi sighting.

content.detailedDescription: We are unsure whether this occurrence has anything to do with an extraterrestrial event, however an extremely loud boom took place at 1:50 pm that was heard and felt throughout the town of potsdam, ny as well as the various surrounding areas within at least a ten mile radius. it was felt by practically every person in potsdam; it rattled windows, shook entire houses and buildings, and has mystified all who have addressed it. no evidence supporting a geologic explanation has been found. at the time of the boom i was taking a historical geology lab test and we were all distracted by a loud noise and felt the entire room shake. we were in a ground level classroom with a metal ceiling.
content.summary: Unexplained enormous boom

content.detailedDescription: While watching a comercial on natgo. taco or pizza com just as the shot went to the van  an unidentified object by me flew over their heads in the background.Any idea what this is.See for your self comercial on natgo the truth about crop circles.8:00pm eastern time.
content.summary: Ufo in comercial

content.detailedDescription: Im in nw austin at the arboretum, looking to the east there is a circular pattern of very bright lights seemingly circulating around an object high up in the sky. i thought maybe it was coming from the ground, like a car dealership with a couple huge spotlights, but the lights are clearly horizontal coming from something fairly high in the sky, i called keye tv and they are sending out someone to investigate. wish i had a video camera but i dont. anyone else in austin seeing this?
content.summary: Lights strobbing in nw austin in circular pattern

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my bedroom, i happened to look out the window and i saw and orange light hover a few hundred feet in the air. i looked down to type something into google, i looked up about a minute later and it was gone. i live under an airport's flight path, but i've seen enough planes to know, that wasn't one. i laso noticed further away in the distance when i look up after typing into google, a faint  light changing colour flying very fast of into the distant ( too fast for anything of human technology) though this time it looked more like a missle of somekind, maybe chasing after previous object, i am very terrified of what i have just seen and at this moment in time i am getting shivers up my spine just thinking and typing about it.
content.summary: Orange glowing spherical light

content.detailedDescription:
This picture was captured 11jan 2010, 1:58:53 pm . through the view finder, i could see the object quickly passing the sky above my garden.

please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from:  http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: White triangle ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Oak ridge, tn:
it was the evening before thanksgiving, 25 nov 2009.  i went outside for some reason (taking out the trash?), looked over my home to the north and saw a bright star like object moving west to east.  i thought it was a plane at first, but the intensity of the light never varied, and there were no blinking lights as on planes.  i watched it for a minute, then noticed a smaller star like object following it.  i didn't have the impression they they were lights on a single object, but rather two independent lights.  in spite of the lack of blinking lights, i figured it to be airplanes approaching the knoxville airport, but after reading three other very similar accounts on mufon's site, the lights appear to have moved across east tennessee.  maybe they were satellites, but i'm pretty sure they were planes.  i went into the house to get my binoculars to see the objects better, went into the back yard on the north side of the house, but tree limbs blocked the view.  i went back to the front yard, but the lights were out of sight.  it seems to me they disappeared behind clouds, but i'm not 100% sure of that.
content.summary: Bright blue-white star trailed by dim blue-white star, moving w to e

content.detailedDescription: Wass taking pic of the contrail that u see in the pic,noticed 5 bright round metalic objects near the contrail grabed cam an snaped 1 pic b4 they,well just disappeared.Weather was clear and a little brezzy,temp wass bout 58-61.Was at my apartment sitting on floor in front of tv playing a video game with my friend zac,i noticed the objects when i looked at the contrail,i had no idea what they were,but the one on the bottom right was leaving a slight trail as it went thru contrail.The objects were moving slow and in a triangle type formation.The bottom right was the brightest.All i felt was just wow.After i took the pic looked down at the pic an went to take another pic an they were gone
content.summary: 5 round metalic object

content.detailedDescription: Me and father were traveling from spfld illinois to decatur il approx 530-6-630 am when i seen a star type object pulsating far ahead off to the right..Realizing it was to bright to be a plane i couldnt understand how it was so bright being obviously sooo far away..I asked my dad if he seen it and he said yes its probably a plane or helicopter so i said "thats awful bright dont you think"...So im watching and watching this light as i had seen unknown objects in the sky before several times....So im glued to these lights and then what seemed like 2-3 minutes after watching it at that distance it came at us in the blink of an eye what seemed to be about half the distance now closer and for what seemed another 20-30 seconds i watched this one light.Now convinced this is something strange i continued to watch..Again in the blink of an eye the 1 light went to 2 white lights...And onlt for about 3 seconds it remained 2 lights..The 2 lights then went to a red and blueish green like ive never seen b4..The red was so bright blood red with some kind of orange in it...At this point i looked at my dad and said oh my god dad are you seeing this..And he said yes...I begged him to stop so i could get out and see better .He said exact words "hell no"..Ok so now these 2 lights went to the red and blue colors and was strobbing super fast unlike any strobe effects ive ever seen..And i noticed only by the flashes of strobe how it was moving around us cuz it was dark and i couldnt actualy make out a shape...Logicaly thinking i looked back at the highway to see if the road was turning or if in fact it was this ufo moving..Sure enough the road was str8 as far as i could see behind and in front of us so this thingmovd bythetime i looked back at the ufo it had yet again moved (my dad was speachless or i just dont remember him saying much only looking at it and trying to drive at the same time.. so i am now totaly convinced this is a ufo..It did 3 (what i call ) skips where it flew at least what appeared to be a 2-3 mile distance per skip it was like zoom-zoom-zoom and each zoom was a 2-3 mile distance coming to a complete stop in between skips but for only a fraction of a second it paused between skips..Now how the hell could this be a human occupied craft? the g force alone would flatten a human...Also there was absolutly no sign of jet perpulsion or fire boost rockets or nothing...After the 3rd "skip" i noticed it was on the direct side of vehicle about 2 city blocks away from our truck...And the red abd blue strobs went about 4-5 strobs each and i could tell it was gaining distance between each flash of the strobe and they wwere super fast strobes so the distance had to be like i said before at kleast 2 miles each time...Also i have witnessed very bright cigar shaped craft in broad daylight near st louis for approx 2 minutes slanted..Extremly huge and very far away making it in my opinion extra terestrial craft..I have seen a cluster of 6 near chicago during sunrise hours lasted nearly 10-12 minutes..As a child(my 1st sighting) i seen what then in thought was saturn or the planet with rings? i seen this in late afternoon on a school bus on the way home...Many years later after other sighting i can only speculate i had a sighting as a child bcuz you cant see saturn in the daytime from your school bus...Lol i assume the "rings" on what i saw was actualy a disc of some kind ? ok that was alot of typing and you probably think im crazy..Lol this is some serious stuff...We are not alone!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light changed from 1 light to 2 lights

content.detailedDescription: Two unknown object crashed into ground near  mongolian capital city. one is smaller about 10 kg, another is huge approx 2ton.
content.summary: Two unknown object crashed into ground

content.detailedDescription:
On the way home, i was driving with my girlfriend and we were coming to a four-way stop at martinazzi and sagert. i saw a bright red light above the tree line in the direction we were going. as i came up to another four-way stop on avery, we could clearly make out a large low-flying red light that was sort of pulsating. it was moving from our right to left, (from sw to ne). it was one very large red pulsing light, but there also seemed to be a smaller red light on its side, and was pulsing as well, but differently and very fast. there was no white lights, indicating it was a plane, and no blue lights either, just one very large red light, along with a smaller red light on its side. 

then as my girlfriend and i were watching it, it made a sharp 45 degree turn and was coming towards us.  it seemed very low and almost just above the tree line above some apartments that were to our left. the light made no noise at all, even planes very far away make a decent amount of noise, this thing was silent.

we took a right almost right after the four way stop on avery and wanted to be able to stop and see this thing better.  as we pulled over to stop, when we looked back to see the light, there was nothing.  as soon as we noticed that the light was gone, right above us were two large low-flying helicopters, (with white, blue, and red lights) they were coming at each other and looked like they were going to hit each other.  they flew right next to one another, and took off in opposite directions, almost in search of something. these we could hear and we could also make out the shape of them. the other thing we didnt hear anything from it, neither could we make out a distinct shape, it only seemed maybe like an oval or sphere.
content.summary: Low flying large red pulsing spherical light
